faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about BonjourImmo.

questions.q1: How does BonjourImmo ensure my property gets noticed?
questions.q3: Can I modify my listing after posting?
questions.q4: Is there a limit to the number of listings I can post?
questions.q5: Is my data secure on BonjourImmo?
questions.q6: What types of properties can I list?
questions.q7: Can I change or deactivate my listing anytime?
questions.q8: How do I communicate with potential buyers or renters?
questions.q9: Whatâ€™s the difference between Basic, Plus, and Premium listings?
questions.q10: Can agencies list properties on BonjourImmo?

answers.a1: We use a priority-based search algorithm to boost visibility for Plus and Premium listings. Premium listings enjoy top placement, ensuring they attract the most attention.
answers.a2: No hidden feesâ€”our pricing is straightforward. You only pay a one-time fee for your chosen listing type (Basic, Plus, or Premium).
answers.a3: Yes, you can update the status of your listing (e.g., Active, Sold, Rented) directly from your dashboard. For other updates, such as title or description changes, please contact our support team via the contact page. We'll handle these updates for you free of charge.
answers.a4: There is no monthly limit for listings. Each listing is a one-time purchase (Basic, Plus, or Premium) and stays live until you deactivate it.
answers.a5: Yes, your data is protected with industry-standard encryption, and all user accounts are verified for added security.
answers.a6: You can list apartments, houses, land, or vacation rentals for sale or rent. The platform is versatile to suit various property types.
answers.a7: Yes, you can update the status of your listing (e.g., Active, Sold, Rented, Inactive) anytime from your dashboard. Changes in status may affect your listingâ€™s visibility in search results.
answers.a8: We recommend including your preferred contact information (e.g., phone number or email) in your listing so interested buyers or renters can reach you directly.
answers.a9: Basic listings are affordable and standard. Plus listings enjoy better search placement, while Premium listings get top placement and maximum visibility for the best exposure.
answers.a10: No, BonjourImmo is exclusively for private landlords. Agencies are not allowed to list properties on the platform.
